attributes.action: Allow Strictly Come Dancing to continue for the nation’s mental health
attributes.additional_details: To stop a rise in depression in winter whilst we are in lockdown
attributes.background: Strictly Come Dancing cheers people up in the worst of winters. This is surely one of those times - allow them to keep filming for the our nation’s mental health

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for the BBC.
